channel.title: Server source compile/run codes?
channel.description:
My compiling error is javac: file not found: src\server\event\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
My compiling code is @echo off title Compiling Optic-Pkz "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause
My run error is 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
My run code is @echo off title RUN java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
Can someone please with me correct codes, btw I'm using blank client/source.. Some reason the source never worked..

item.title: Server source compile/run codes?
item.dc:creator: @yuk yuk
item.description:
@yuk wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:2, topic:524561”]compiler: remove that path from the compiler or add a java source file to it
run: fix your environmental variables[/quote]

Okay I removed it I get this error now

javac: directory not found: bin
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

And fix what in my ev? Can you tell me what to replace with what?
Thanks =]

Read full topic

item.title: Server source compile/run codes?
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

Run fix…:

@echo off
title RUN
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\java.exe” -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

basicallyREAD THIS!!!

Java is not being found so, all you need to do is copy and paste the compiler directory, and remove the c in javac.exe…

It works, I never get a error, or problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Server source compile/run codes?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

compiler: remove that path from the compiler or add a java source file to it
run: fix your environmental variables

Read full topic

item.title: Server source compile/run codes?
item.dc:creator: @yuk yuk
item.description:
@yuk wrote:

My compiling error is
javac: file not found: src\server\event*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

My compiling code is
@echo off
title Compiling Optic-Pkz
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java
pause

My run error is
‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

My run code is
@echo off
title RUN
java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Can someone please with me correct codes, btw I’m using blank client/source… Some reason the source never worked…
